describe: Malta is a small island nation in the Mediterranean Sea, known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and beautiful beaches. It has a unique blend of cultural influences from its past rulers, including the Romans, Moors, Knights of Saint John, French, and British.

cities.name: 🏝 Valletta
cities.geographical_location: Located on the eastern coast of Malta, Valletta is the capital city.
cities.climate: Valletta has a Mediterranean climate with hot, dry summers and mild, wet winters.

cities.name: 🏙 Mdina
cities.geographical_location: Situated in the central part of Malta, Mdina is a fortified city.
cities.climate: Mdina shares the Mediterranean climate, with warm summers and mild winters.

cities.name: 🏝 Sliema
cities.geographical_location: Located on the northeast coast of Malta, Sliema is a major residential and commercial area.
cities.climate: Sliema enjoys a Mediterranean climate, characterized by hot summers and mild, rainy winters.
